title: Brought rune pages
body: As someone who bought rune pages I'm concerned as to whats going to happen to those when the new Rune system comes out?

replies.body: Fret Not Friend! We're still working on ironing out exactly what the compensation will look like, but rest easy knowing that we're taking plenty of time make sure that compensation will be up to snuff! We want to make sure that [**everyone is rewarded properly for all the IP/runes/rune pages they've earned**](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6e90bf/runes_reforged_and_honor_update_riot_pls_league/di8tda0/) or bought over the years!
